keys: Matemàtiques i ciències de la naturalesa
Matemáticas y ciencias de la naturaleza

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/824</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/824</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El rastre del cargol</string>
            <string language="en">The snail trail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schneckespur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La traînée d'escargot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fuga do caracol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La traccia della lumaca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ίχνος σαλιγκαριών</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica sobre l'espiral.
Té els següents apartats: l'espiral del cargol, espirals a casa, dibuixar espirals, espirals vegetals, el volum de l'espiral, un nombre màgic. Conté diversos tipus d'activitats:informatives, pràctiques, interactives, i d'ampliació.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching unit on the spiral with the following sections: the snail spiral, spirals in the home, drawing spirals, plant spirals, the volume of a spiral, a magic number. It includes different types of activities: informative, practical, interactive, and extension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aritmètica</string>
            <string language="en">arithmetic</string>
            <string language="es">aritmética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geometria</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Matemàtiques i ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Natural Sciences</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas y ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Maßeinheit auf der Spirale
mit den folgenden Kapiteln: die SchneckeSpirale, 
Spiralen in den Haupt-, zeichnenden Spiralen, 
BetriebsSpiralen, der Datenträger einer Spirale, eine 
magische Zahl. Sie schließt unterschiedliche Typen von 
Aktivitäten ein: informativ, praktisch, interaktiv und 
Extension.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement sur la spirale avec les 
sections suivantes : la spirale d'escargot, spirales dans les 
spirales à la maison et dessinantes, usine se développe en spirales,
le volume d'une spirale, un nombre magique. Elle inclut 
différents types d'activités : instructif, pratique, 
interactif, et extension.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando na espiral com as seguintes 
seções: a espiral do caracol, espirais nas espirais home, 
desenhando, planta espirala, o volume de uma espiral, um número 
mágico. Inclui tipos diferentes de atividades: 
informative, prático, interativo, e extensão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione sulla spirale con le seguenti
sezioni: la spirale della lumaca, spirali nelle spirali 
domestiche e dissipanti, pianta si sviluppa a spirale, il volume di 
una spirale, un numero magico. Include i tipi differenti di 
attività: informativo, pratico, interattivo ed estensione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα διδασκαλίας στη σπείρα με τα εξής τμήματα: 
η σπείρα σαλιγκαριών, σπείρες στο σπίτι, που σύρει τις 
σπείρες, φυτεύει τις σπείρες, η ένταση του ήχου μιας σπείρας, 
ένας μαγικός αριθμός. Περιλαμβάνει τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους δραστηριοτήτων: πληροφοριακός, πρακτικός, 
διαλογικός, και επέκταση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arithmetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arithmétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et sciences normales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aritmética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e ciências naturais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aritmetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e scienze naturali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριθμητική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και φυσικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
